options.subject: =Congratulations! Here's your confirmation for Miles {{ $('Postgres3').item.json["Program - ProgramId__name"]=="CPA"?"CPA":"CMA" }} Townhall with Varun Jain🔥

parameters.query:
SELECT
  "public"."orientation"."id" AS "id",
  "public"."orientation"."orientation_date" AS "orientation_date",
  "public"."orientation"."programId" AS "programId",
  "public"."orientation"."milesLocationId" AS "milesLocationId",
  "public"."orientation"."orientation_name" AS "orientation_name",
  "Miles Office - MilesLocationId"."address" AS "Miles Office - MilesLocationId__address",
  "Miles Office - MilesLocationId"."city" AS "Miles Office - MilesLocationId__city",
  "Miles Office - MilesLocationId"."contact" AS "Miles Office - MilesLocationId__contact",
  "Miles Office - MilesLocationId"."location_url" AS "Miles Office - MilesLocationId__location_url",
  "Miles Office - MilesLocationId"."lat" AS "Miles Office - MilesLocationId__lat",
  "Miles Office - MilesLocationId"."lng" AS "Miles Office - MilesLocationId__lng",
  "Program - ProgramId"."name" AS "Program - ProgramId__name",
  "Program - ProgramId"."full_form" AS "Program - ProgramId__full_form"
FROM
  "public"."orientation"
 
LEFT JOIN "public"."miles_office" AS "Miles Office - MilesLocationId" ON "public"."orientation"."milesLocationId" = "Miles Office - MilesLocationId"."id"
  LEFT JOIN "public"."program" AS "Program - ProgramId" ON "public"."orientation"."programId" = "Program - ProgramId"."id"
where "public"."orientation"."id" = {{ $json.orientation_session_id }}
LIMIT
  1048575
